scripts.patch: npm run test && read -p 'Patch: ' M; npatch "$M" && git push origin master
scripts.minor: npm run test && read -p 'Minor: ' M; nminor "$M" && git push origin master
scripts.major: npm run test && read -p 'Major: ' M; nmajor "$M" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run heroku
